message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. It's a fair starting point. Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was a bit steep. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the pot shrinks with each round.
Okay, let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55% and leave you 45%.  If we keep rejecting each other, the pot will dwindle further, and neither of us will get what we want.
